mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT * FROM tags ORDER BY id) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT user_id, tag_id AS id, name FROM usertags u, tags t WHERE u.tag_id = t.id GROUP BY user_id, tag_id, name ORDER BY user_id, tag_id) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT board_id, tag_id AS id, name, b.title, cc.content AS cc_content FROM boardtags bt, tags t, board b, commoncodes cc WHERE bt.tag_id = t.id AND bt.board_id = b.id AND b.big_code = cc.big_code AND b.small_code = cc.small_code GROUP BY board_id, tag_id, name, b.title, cc.content ORDER BY board_id, tag_id) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM (SELECT content_id, tag_id AS id, name, c.title, cc.content AS cc_content FROM contenttags ct, tags t, contents c, commoncodes cc WHERE ct.tag_id = t.id AND ct.content_id = c.id AND c.big_code = cc.big_code AND cc.small_code = 999 GROUP BY content_id, tag_id, name, c.title, cc.content ORDER BY content_id, tag_id) a ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
